content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Original Stone Furnace at position (43, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (43.0, -82.0)) with fuel {'coal': 9} and producing {'iron-plate': 1}
- Burner mining drill (position (40.0, -84.0)) with fuel {'coal': 4} and status working
- Wooden chest (position (39.5, -85.5)) with inventory {'coal': 198}

### New Stone Furnace at position (45, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (45.0, -82.0)) with fuel {'coal': 18} and producing {'iron-plate': 3}
- Burner mining drill (position (40.0, -84.0)) with fuel {'coal': 4} and status working
- Wooden chest (position (39.5, -85.5)) with inventory {'coal': 198}

### Copper Plate Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position (y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position (y3)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Assembling machine at position (z1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position (z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. For example, errors occurred when trying to insert coal and iron ore when the inventory was empty.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Repeated errors with coal and iron ore insertion
- Check your inventory frequently to ensure you have enough resources before performing insert operations to avoid repeated errors.
